law.catch_line: Pollution Liability Reinsurance Corporation; Creation; Board Of Directors; Board Duties; Reports And Audits

text.section: any entity obtaining reinsurance of pollution liability policies from the Corporation;
any insurance company licensed or approved to provide, and actually writing, pollution liability coverage within the commonwealth; and
any company or entity whose engagement by the Corporation would, in the judgment of the board, pose the appearance or reality of a conflict of interest.
